name: Solidtime
short_description: A simple, secure, and private time tracking app with detailed reports and CSV export.
description: A simple, secure, and private time tracking app with detailed reports and CSV export. Solidtime is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, time-tracking, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Solidtime on your home server to a simple, secure, and private time tracking app with detailed reports and csv export without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Solidtime to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
